Parameters: String: The system identifier as a URI string.
setSystemId(java.lang.String).Description: Set the system identifier for this Result. If the Result is not to be written to a file, the system identifier is optional. The application may still want to provide one, however, for use in error messages and warnings, or to resolve relative output identifiers.

Returns: The system identifier that was set with setSystemId, or null if setSystemId was not called.
getSystemId().Description: Get the system identifier that was set with setSystemId.

ClassDesc: An object that implements this interface contains the information needed to build a transformation result tree.
